That is, until a boy the same age she was arrived in her life...and he was actually interested in these magical lips of hers. A boy of about 5 foot 11, with a decent-sized gut, short, black hair, and typically wore glasses on his face, young Derek Simon was not one girls paid attention to across the school. "T-thanks, Stacey. You look nice today, too", he shyly replied to the smiling girl.

"You say that every day, even when my hair's a mess like it is today", the girl faintly complained, brushing her hair back between her fingers. "Is there something you wanted to talk about?"

"...and...?" Stacey continued. "You wanted to invite me over to your house? You want to get something to eat? You want me to participate in some sort of dancing contest? What?"

"Um...I know that a lot of guys are repelled by your lips, and I just wanted to say that..."

Stacey frowned at the moment Derek said "repelled by your lips". The girl turned around and started walking out the front gate.

"...and I just wanted to say that I'm fine with it!" Derek continued to a surprised Stacey, who turned around just then. She was a little stunned to hear Derek said that, the closet thing she had to a boyfriend for over a month.

"R-really?"

"Yes", he sternly replied. "Actually, I was wondering if you and I could...kiss..."

"Really? You want me to kiss you?" Stacey lit up, taking out a stick of lipstick from her pause and dabbing some of it on her lips. "Are you sure? You could into a giant, or be the size of an ant! You could inflate like a balloon or even become a fruit!"

"There you go again", flushed Stacey, hugging Derek in her arms as she dropped her school bag on the ground. "You're the sweetest guy I've met in my senior year of high school!" And with that, Stacey pressed her lips closer and closer to the boy that made her then so happy...unless the tables change a bit, of course.

Derek looked down in shock to see that she was right!? His belly was staring to poke out from his uniform, however that wasn't the only part of his body that started to grow. He started to feel himself get bigger all around as his thighs and butt joined in, starting to stretch his black khakis and press together. His arms started to get thicker as well, making him have to hold up his arms and spread his legs. His face started to get rounder as well as his legs and arms started to get sucked into his rounding body. His uniform started to rip off his rounding body, unable to keep up with his growth, leaving him in only his underwear stretched as far as it could go.

When all was said and done, Derek was a round ball around 6ft tall in only his underwear, with the rest of his clothing in pieces around him. He tried to move forward towards Stacey but could only wobble back and forward!!

Stacey, still in awe at her boyfriends transformation saw this and started to giggle, "My you certainly are a big boy what am I going to do with you?" she said with a smirk.
1242.title: belly. You're filling up with air!"

choices: Derek gets scared and runs away
125.content:
"..you're becoming an English Bulldog!" Stacey told Derek. He looked at his body and realized that he was starting to become covered in fur.

"Wow, you're really adorable!" Stacey exclaimed as patted him on the head. Derek tried to talk, but no words would come out of his mouth.

"Sit, boy," Stacey commanded, watching Derek sit automatically.

"Wow, this is wonderful," Stacey yelled in surprise delight. "I never knew this would happen!" Derek still couldn't get any words out, even a single bark.

"What's wrong? Dog got your tongue?" Stacey asked. Then she began to laugh at the annoyed dog.
125.title: "You're Becoming an English Bulldog!"

choices: Stacey and Derek make it to her home with no problems
1251.content:
Derek barked several times at Stacey, annoyed by his treating him like a dog (even though he was one). Instead of being upset, though, Stacey took out a leach from her pocket and clipped it to the boy's collar.

What was she doing with a dog collar in her pocket? a confused Derek wondered as Stacey smiled at him.

"Come on, Derek! Let's go for a walk before the janitor finds us!" she quickly told her new "pet" as she ran out of the school, grabbing both her books and Derek's. The two ran for what had to be at least 200 feet before finally stopping, now in the middle of a grass clearing. Derek, who was not used to running for so long, panted quite a bit on the ground next to Stacey.

"That was close", panted Stacey as she took out a water bottle from her school bag. She drank down about one-third of the contents before placing the bottle in front of Derek's face.

"Here, Derek!" the girl chirped as she poured the water on his face, the thirsty "dog" drinking it down like it was his last water he would ever have. After he was done drinking it, Stacey sat on the ground besides him, petting Derek with her right hand as she looked at the pretty afternoon sky.

"I'm sorry about earlier. But I'll promise to be much nicer to you until you turn back into my boyfriend again!"

Derek believed every word of his girlfriend. She might be a bit of an oddball, but she was always honest.

"Since you can't go back home today, why not come to my house, Derek?"

"Woof!" a happy Derek barked in reply, licking Stacey's hand.

"Thank you!" she replied as she hugged the "bulldog".
1251.title: Stacey's new "pet"

choices: Derek suddenly turns back into a human
Stays brings him chicken and rolls. He stays a "bulldog"
12512.content:
Derek ended up following Stacey home wit no problems at all. He was annoyed by the stares he got (as he was annoyed at the time, he looked a little menacing to kids and women), but at least no one could recognize him.

15 minutes later they made it to Stacey's house, which was a moderate sized house with red paint. There were two windows on the second floor, indicating that Stacey was an only child, with the other room for her parents.

The two quietly went inside and ran up to her room. Stacey's mom didn't like how she brought pets (or other people transformed into animals) into her home, so the girl tried to be quiet about it as possible. Fortunately her parents weren't home, so they got up to her light red-colored room easily. Once they got inside her room, Stacey closed the door quickly behind her.

"You can lay on the bed or whatever you want. I'll go get you some food", the perky girl said to Derek as she went downstairs to get something to eat. Before she did, though, she told him:

"Please don't make much noise."

Stacey then left the room. Moments later Derek was on her bed, his fur slowly covering her orange blanket in it.
12512.title: Easy goings

125121.content:
As Derek lied on Stacey's bed, his body almost instantly returned to its human form of before. Even his clothes were intact!

Now that he could stand on his legs again, Derek looked around Stacey's bedroom and noticed how cute it was. He also noticed a scrapbook and looked through it, opening it up as he flipped through the pages of it. One picture was of him and Stacey hugging each other as children, and another was of their school trip a year before. In fact, he was so enthralled in it, he didn't notice Stacey returning to her bedroom. When she opened the door with a plate of chicken in her hands, she looked at Derek..
125121.title: Derek's Dog Days are over

choices: a very detailed collage dedicated to Derek... And Stacey's love for him...
an embarrassing collage showing transformations that Stacey has been through...
1251211.content:
As Stacey saw Derek looking through her scrapbook, she ran up and snatched it away from him.

"Derek! This is my personal scrapbook! Why were you looking through it?!"

"Well... I just turned back to normal, and I had nothing to do while I waited for you... I'm sorry..."

Stacey simply sighed as she began to calm down.

"I guess it's okay Derek, but please don't go looking at my stuff without permission anymore..."

"Alright Stacey, I won't... But what's the big deal? It only seemed to have pictures of the two of us... I don't see why-"

Stacey cut Derek off, blushing like crazy.

"You didn't see the last page, right?!"

"Well... No... But why does that matter?"

"Oh, thank goodness... Let's just say that some things are better left unseen... It's way too embarrassing!"

"Ah, come on Stace! It can't be that bad, can it?"

"Well... I just don't... You promise that you won't laugh if I show you?"

Derek looked confused for a moment, but then nodded.

"I promise, Stacey. You're my girlfriend, and I'd never do something like that!"

"Alright... I suppose that I can show you..."

Stacey then nervously opened up her scrapbook to the final page, upon which there was a collage of photos. But not just any collage of photos, this one was...
1251211.title: Some things are better left unseen!

choices: Derek looks further into it, to see what else is there
12512112.content:
Derek flipped through the book and saw a two-page collage of Stacey's various changes. These included: cat, skunk, dog, bee, shrunk to doll size, an actual doll, a potted plant, a stuffed animal, a cell phone, dragon, and even a dragon! He wondered how the pictures were taken, but decided not to ask.

"Well, this is pretty interesting", Derek replied, the only words he could really say. He wondered how the pictures were even taken..was someone following her, or did she take them herself?

"It's kind of fun to look at them now, in retrospect", she smiled, holding his hand as he held it on the pages in the scrapbook. "Embarrassing, but fun."
12512112.title: Stacey's "greatest" hits

choices: They slowly change into mythological figures
1251212.content:
"I see you've found my scrapbook", Stacey said as she put down the plate of chicken on her desk and sat down on her bed, wrapping her arm around Derek. "I guess you know I've had a crush on you since we first met."

"Y-You did?!"

"Yep. I love you, Derek", Stacey said as she almost kissed Derek..until she remembered her lip curse.

"Oops, sorry!" she chuckled nervously. "I almost forgot."

"I love you too, Stacey!" Derek replied as he kissed HER on the lips, shocking her.
1251212.title: More than friends

12512121.content:
She took a couple of steps back before starting to grow fur all over her body. She was starting to shrink out of her clothes and her nose was becoming smaller and pink. She looked over at Derek to see the same thing was happening to him. He looked more than a little frightened as his hands started to turn into hamster paws.

Stacey did the only thing she could think of and threw her arms around him in an attempt to comfort him. They continue to shrink and shrink until they're clothes no longer fit. She opens her eyes to if they were done changing yet and...
12512121.title: They slowly change into hamsters

info.brief_description: Misadventures of a bubbly 18 year-old born with a weird curse concerning her lips.
info.description: At first glance, Stacey Calborne seems like the perfect girl. She's funny, smart, flirty, and considered quite attractive by the boys in her school. Her lips especially are considered to be the nicest set of lips on any girl in her school, but they also carry a strange curse..
info.pretty_title: With the Touch of a Kiss
